name: Panagiotis Rondogiannis
content: Panagiotis Rondogiannis Panos Rondogiannis Professor Department of Informatics and Telecommunications University of Athens Panepistimiopolis 157 84 Athens, Greece e-mail: prondo [at] di [dot] uoa [dot] gr Phone number: +(30)-210-7275102 Education B.Sc. University of Patras, Greece, 1989 M.Sc. University of Victoria, Canada, 1991 Ph.D. University of Victoria, Canada, 1994 Research Interests Logic Programming/Nonmonotonic Reasoning Functional/Dataflow Programming Semantics of Programming Languages Publications (DBLP) Teaching (in Greek) Principles of Programming Languages Theory of Computation Semantics of Programming Languages The graduate program ALMA Some Pictures
